title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≤ 1

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≥ 1

2 points are earned for constants

f ( x ) = { x 2 2 + C 1 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 + C 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 1 2 + C 1 ⇒ C 1 = − 1 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 2 − 1 2 + C 2 ⇒ C 2 = − 3 2 f ( x ) = { x 2 2 − 1 2 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 − 3 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 o r f ( x ) = x − 1 2 ( x − 1 ) | x − 1 | − 1
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≤ 1

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≥ 1

2 points are earned for constants

f ( x ) = { x 2 2 + C 1 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 + C 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 1 2 + C 1 ⇒ C 1 = − 1 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 2 − 1 2 + C 2 ⇒ C 2 = − 3 2 f ( x ) = { x 2 2 − 1 2 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 − 3 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 o r f ( x ) = x − 1 2 ( x − 1 ) | x − 1 | − 1

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≤ 1

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≥ 1

2 points are earned for constants

f ( x ) = { x 2 2 + C 1 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 + C 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 1 2 + C 1 ⇒ C 1 = − 1 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 2 − 1 2 + C 2 ⇒ C 2 = − 3 2 f ( x ) = { x 2 2 − 1 2 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 − 3 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 o r f ( x ) = x − 1 2 ( x − 1 ) | x − 1 | − 1

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≤ 1

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≥ 1

2 points are earned for constants

f ( x ) = { x 2 2 + C 1 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 + C 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 1 2 + C 1 ⇒ C 1 = − 1 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 2 − 1 2 + C 2 ⇒ C 2 = − 3 2 f ( x ) = { x 2 2 − 1 2 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 − 3 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 o r f ( x ) = x − 1 2 ( x − 1 ) | x − 1 | − 1

The student response earns three of the following points:

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≤ 1

1 point is earned for anti derivative for x ≥ 1

2 points are earned for constants

f ( x ) = { x 2 2 + C 1 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 + C 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 1 2 + C 1 ⇒ C 1 = − 1 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 2 − 1 2 + C 2 ⇒ C 2 = − 3 2 f ( x ) = { x 2 2 − 1 2 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 − 3 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 o r f ( x ) = x − 1 2 ( x − 1 ) | x − 1 | − 1

The student response earns four of the following points:

2 points are earned for constants

f ( x ) = { x 2 2 + C 1 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 + C 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 1 2 + C 1 ⇒ C 1 = − 1 2 0 = f ( 1 ) = 2 − 1 2 + C 2 ⇒ C 2 = − 3 2 f ( x ) = { x 2 2 − 1 2 if   0 < x ≤ 1 2 x − x 2 2 − 3 2 if 1 ≤ x < 2 o r f ( x ) = x − 1 2 ( x − 1 ) | x − 1 | − 1
